question: 徹夜
partsOfSpeech: noun, する verb, の adjective
sourceMnemonic: <kanji>Penetrate</kanji> the <kanji>night</kanji> and go on through to the morning. You were up <vocabulary>all night</vocabulary> and had a <vocabulary>sleepless night</vocabulary> aka <vocabulary>all nighter</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
